document.full_text: the u.s. state department on friday broadened its travel warning on mexico to include parts of five additional states, including a highway where suspected drug gangs shot two u.s. customs officials in february.
document.title: u.s. warns on travel to five more mexican states
lines_and_colors: the u.s. state department on friday broadened its travel warning on mexico to include parts of five additional states, including a highway where suspected drug gangs shot two u.s. customs officials in february.
